name: monogamous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
being married to, or having a sexual relationship with, only one person at a time: a monogamous relationship I am in a monogamous marriage and we have two sons.
biology
  specialized A monogamous animal or bird has only one mate (= sexual partner) at a time: The puffin usually returns to the same puffin wife as it is very monogamous. Pair-bonding probably evolved in a similar way in prairie voles as in other monogamous animals. Related word
monogamy
More examplesFewer examplesI've always believed that if I get married, the marriage will be strictly monogamous.The researchers are working with monogamous couples, one of whom is infected with the virus.I am in a committed monogamous relationship.Female gorillas are highly monogamous.
